sponsors.name: Major League Hacking
sponsors.description: We supports for hackathons and provide monetory supports upto $1000.

sponsors.name: Google
sponsors.description: We sponsor a wide range of events related to technology and innovation, offering financial support as well as mentorship and resources to help make events a success.

sponsors.name: Microsoft
sponsors.description: We offer a range of support options for event organizers, including financial sponsorship, technical support, and access to our network of experts and resources.

sponsors.name: IBM
sponsors.description: We offer financial sponsorship and access to our technology and expertise for events related to artificial intelligence, cloud computing, and other cutting-edge topics.

sponsors.name: Salesforce
sponsors.description: We offer sponsorship for events related to sales, marketing, and customer relationship management (CRM), as well as access to our technology and resources.

sponsors.name: Intel
sponsors.description: As a sponsor, we offer technical and financial support for events related to technology and innovation, as well as access to our network of experts and resources.

sponsors.name: Chipotle
sponsors.description: We offer food sponsorship for hackathons, providing delicious and customizable burritos, bowls, and other menu items to keep participants fueled and focused.

sponsors.name: GitHub
sponsors.description: We offer financial sponsorship and access to our technology and expertise for hackathons related to coding and software development.

sponsors.name: Twilio
sponsors.description: We offer financial sponsorship and access to our communication APIs for hackathons focused on building innovative messaging, voice, and video applications.
